publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3062.1 Ms Sandra White: Glasgow Airport Rail Link-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3062) in the name of Robert Brown, leave out from "and believes" to end and insert "and condemns the lack of action from the Scottish Executive and successive governments in implementing the scheme and calls on the Executive to immediately instruct the Strategic Rail Authority to commence work on this vital project at the earliest possible date." Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Linda Fabiani*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-3062.1 Glasgow Airport Rail Link (lodged on 10 May 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3062.1 Glasgow Airport Rail Link (lodged on 10 May 2002) Alex Neil*, Stewart Stevenson*, Colin Campbell*
S1M-3062.1 Glasgow Airport Rail Link (lodged on 10 May 2002) Nicola Sturgeon*
S1M-3062.1 Glasgow Airport Rail Link (lodged on 10 May 2002) Fergus Ewing*
